title: YouTube Music for Android rolls out ‘Save’ queue to playlist feature from Play Music [U]
content:
After first launching for iOS at the start of this year, YouTube Music is widely rolling out the “Save” queue to playlist feature on Android.

more…

The post YouTube Music for Android rolls out ‘Save’ queue to playlist feature from Play Music [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube Music is working on the ability to save your current queue as a playlist. This joins a new Material You widget and recap as recent...
